fullText:
Violent Awakening

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Half-orc, furious assault racial power, monk, Flurry of Blows class feature
Special: When your furious assault and your Flurry of Blows power are triggered by the same hit, one target of your Flurry of Blows power takes extra damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 135.
